channel.title: How can i make it when you type a command
channel.description:
how can i change it so that after you type a command it saves the file automatically? as in it saves your game just incase it disconnects?
because when i have my dialouge at the end it has "learnt = true" but you have to wait 5 mins for it to save or you have to do it all again
thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 02:16:22 PM[/size][hr]anyone help?

item.title: How can i make it when you type a command
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Add this in the end savemoreinfo();

=) found it like 2 seconds before you posted

i waited for it to say “saved more info for NAME” then searched it in client.java

i gave you love(++)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make it when you type a command
